name: Purchase Order Delay and Approved
query:
SELECT
    po.name AS "Purchase Order Id",
    po.transaction_date AS "Created Date",
    po.approved_date AS "Approved Date",
    IF(po.approved_date IS NULL, DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, po.transaction_date), 0) AS delay_days
FROM
    `tabPurchase Order` po

name: Material Issue Scrap Item Report
query:
SELECT 
se.name as 'Material Issue No',
se.posting_date as 'Date',
sed.item_code as 'Item Code',
sed.item_name as 'Item Name',
sed.qty as 'Require Qty',
se.party_name as 'Require Person Name',
se.issue_location as 'Location',
sed.application as 'Application',
se.remark as "Remark",
sed.old_qty as "Old Qty(Scrap)",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.problem as "Problem",
sed.last_issue_date as "last issue date",
sed.issue_person_name as "Issue Person Name"
from `tabStock Entry` se 
join `tabStock Entry Detail` sed on se.name = sed.parent

where
sed.is_scrap_item =1

name: Material Issue Report
query:
select 
se.posting_date as "Issue Date",
se.name as "Part No",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.qty as "Quantity",
sed.basic_rate as "Unit Price",
sed.amount as "Amount"
from `tabStock Entry` se 
join `tabStock Entry Detail` sed on se.name = sed.parent

where
se.stock_entry_type ="Material Issue"

name: Material Machine Wise Isssue Report
query:
select
sed.item_group as 'Group',
se.posting_date as "Date",
se.name as "Part No",
sed.description as "Description Of Goods",
sed.qty as "Quantity",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.basic_rate as "Rate",
sed.amount as "Amount",
se.department as "Department",
se.owner as "Username",
se.remark as "Remark",
se.issue_location as "Location",
se.shift as "shift",
se.machine as "Machine"
from `tabStock Entry` se
join `tabStock Entry Detail` sed on se.name = sed.parent
where
se.stock_entry_type = "Material Issue"

name: Rejected  Material List
query:
SELECT DISTINCT
    grn.supplier_name,
    prt.purchase_order,
    po.transaction_date,
    grn.gate_entry,
    gt.gate_in_date,
    gt.gate_in_time,
    pr.name,
    pr.posting_date,
    prt.item_code,
    prt.item_name,
    pod.qty as "Po Qty",
    SUM(prt.qty) as "Total Qty",
    SUM(prt.rejected_qty) as "Total Rejected Qty",
    MAX(prt.reject_issue) as "Reject Issue",
    prt.quality_inspection
FROM `tabPurchase Receipt` grn
JOIN (
    SELECT parent, purchase_order, item_code, item_name, qty, rejected_qty, reject_issue, quality_inspection
    FROM `tabPurchase Receipt Item`
) prt ON grn.name = prt.parent
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabPurchase Order` po ON prt.purchase_order = po.name
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabGate Entry` gt ON grn.gate_entry = gt.name
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` pod ON po.name = pod.parent
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` poi ON grn.name = poi.purchase_receipt
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pr ON pr.name = poi.parent
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabQuality Inspection` qc ON prt.quality_inspection = qc.name
WHERE DATE(grn.posting_date) BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
and
prt.rejected_qty
GROUP BY prt.purchase_order, prt.item_code;

name: Po Details
query:
select 
po.name,
po.transaction_date,
po.supplier_name,
pod.material_request,
pod.item_name,
pod.qty,
pod.uom,
pod.price_list_rate,
pod.discount_percentage,
pod.discount_amount * pod.qty as 'Dis. Amt',
pod.amount,
pod.item_taxe_rate,
((pod.amount*pod.item_taxe_rate)/100) as 'Tax Amt',
(((pod.amount*pod.item_taxe_rate)/100)+pod.amount) as 'Amount'
from `tabPurchase Order` po join
`tabPurchase Order Item` pod on po.name = pod.parent
Where
(
       DATE(po.transaction_date) between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )
     
ORDER BY  po.name DESC

name: Purchase Receipt Report
query:
select
pr.name,
prt.material_request,
pr.supplier_name,
prt.item_code,
prt.item_name,
prt.qty,
prt.uom,
prt.price_list_rate,
prt.price_list_rate * prt.qty as 'Total',
prt.discount_percentage,
(prt.discount_percentage * Total)/100 as "Dis Amt",
prt.amount,
prt.item_taxe_rate,
((prt.item_taxe_rate * prt.amount)/100) as 'Tax Amt',
((prt.item_taxe_rate * prt.amount)/100 + prt.amount) as 'Tax Amount'
from `tabPurchase Receipt` pr join
`tabPurchase Receipt Item` prt on pr.name = prt.parent
Where
(
       DATE(pr.posting_date) between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )
ORDER BY  pr.name DESC

name: Material Request
reference_report: Material Requests for which Supplier Quotations are not created

name: Weekly Production Plan
query:
SELECT
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.planned_start_date as "Date:Date/Date:100",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.description as "Design Name:Data/Design Name:200",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.item_code as "Item Code:Data/Item Code:150",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.planned_qty as "Planned Qty:Float",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.produced_qty as "Produced Qty:Float",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.pending_qty as "Pending Qty:Float",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.remarks as "Remarks:Data/Remarks:240",
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.parent as "Production Plan:Link/Production Plan:180"
FROM
  `tabProduction Plan Item`
WHERE
  `tabProduction Plan Item`.planned_start_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
  AND `tabProduction Plan Item`.parent IN (
    SELECT `name` FROM `tabProduction Plan` WHERE `production_line` = %(pl)s
  );
